segments.text: I see the water is still overflowing from the sink, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, not noticing the growing puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is still reaching for the cookie jar, standing precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is still waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so careful, trying not to make any noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be enjoying the excitement, her eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the mess they're making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies must be really good for him to take such a risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
